TextAsset.value: I’m surprised to you see you here, Al.
IN THE VERY SCHOOL YOU AREN’T EVEN IN!
Well played, ${slot:playerName}.
My partner and I had you right where we wanted you, but you knew that.
You knew it all along and stalled until the whole sting operation came crumbling down.
(Hmm, if he thinks his roguish good looks can let him fast talk his way out of this, he’s probably right.)
(But I’m gonna put up a heck of a fight all the same!)
That’s not what I’m talking about at all and you know it!
Dig Dug told me you aren’t enrolled at Namco High. And also that there’s no such thing as the Namco Anti Real Crime club.
What’s up with those two things?
When I first took this assignment, I never would have expected I might encounter a cheat code kingpin.
Much less the criminal mastermind who could outsmart me at every opportunity.
(What is he even talking about!)
(Wait. He looks so distraught…)
(Like a man defeated.)
(GASP. Did King stick him with the Battledome Detention???)
I’ve given up, ${slot:playerName}.
You win.
(WOW! He ran out of here so fast!
I wonder what that was about…)
Negative. Target CODENAME: CUZ failed to appear at the designated mission coordinates. I repeat, OPERATION: JUST CUZ failed.
(Oh, it’s just that Al B. Tross guy.)
(Talking to his watch...)
Affirmative. I suspect the target may have been tipped off.
Yes, chief, I know that’s a severe accusation. I stand by it.
We may have a mole in our ranks.
(And he’s speaking in code. I guess?)
(So weird.)
I’d like to attempt one last strategy.
It’s a long shot, but it’s the only chance we’ve got at catching this target.
Al, you doin’ okay?
END TRANSMISSION!
Um.
Yes.
Just, uh.
Just reading an ebook.
Yes.
Um. On my watch.
And out loud.
(He left so quickly… I wonder what that was all about?)
Hey ${slot:playerName}......
Hey Aki!
Did you happen to hear that crazy rumor about me wearing an amazing purple costume?
With a really cool pink visor? You know, that one rumor where I call myself something crazy... Like Amazona...
.............. No... I hadn't heard that rumor.......
OH HAHAHAHA. ME EITHER!
HAHAHAHAHAHA!
Um... Richard Miller did say something a while ago...
Oh, that guy? He's crazy.
Sometimes people say the craziest stuff! Don’t you think ${slot:playerName}? Hahahahaha!
Y-yeah… the craziest…
Hey ${slot:playerName}...
Are you angry at me?
Not angry... Just frustrated.
It's your secret and I'm sorry that I pried...
But it got me into a lot of trouble.
Well, technically it was my total inability to control my curiosity...
I was a little mad. But I'm over it.
That's good. Listen, ${slot:playerName}... If you want to talk some more, I have something to tell you.
I'll be here, so just let me know.
Hahah-- yeah.
I have something to tell you ${slot:playerName}… just let me know if you want to talk.
Hey Aki! Keeping busy?
A little TOO busy. Hey, listen... If you see any weird creatures walking around, definitely let me know.
It's, um... For the Weird Creatures Club.
Aki... This school is full of weird creatures.
Right... Hahahahaha! Of course.
Hmmm......
Seen anything suspicious around? Like monsters… or space aliens…
(The only thing suspicious is your behavior!)
Anti-Bravoman... I can't stop thinking about our conversation the other day.
I don't understand what's going on...
But I want to believe in you.
I want to believe in the real you.
The... Real me?
${slot:playerName}... It's best that you DON'T believe in me.
I don't want to let you down.
(Now he's lost in thought... I better leave him alone.)
${slot:playerName}… it’s best that you DON’T believe in me.
(I should leave him alone… )
Hey Anti-Bravo!
(Hmmm... Is he ignoring me?
Not exactly... He seems lost in thought.)
Psst!
Psssst! New kid! You should stay away from him...
Haven't you heard the rumor about him?
Rumor?
Yeah... Word in the hall is he's from Evil Namco High!
EVIL NAMCO HIGH?!
Yes... Evil Namco High.
But it's just a rumor...
(Or is it?)
Hey Anti-Bravoman!
(He still doesn’t hear me. Is he really from Evil Namco High? Couldn’t be… )
(Hmm, wonder how Max is doing.)
(He’s just keeping to himself, so maybe he’s okay.)
(Then again, keeping to himself seems to be his only defense!)
(Well, unless he can get that super plane project secret thing off the ground.)
Hey, Max!
AHH!
(Really gotta get this guy to loosen up a little.)
Oh, it’s only you, ${slot:playerName}.
What’s shakin’? You seem a little wound up.
(As usual! Maybe I can help though.)
It’s just PROJECT SUPER SECRET PLANE.
Y’know, the codename for SECRET PROJECT SUPER PLANE!
Right, yeah. They’re the same. Got it.
Well, I very cleverly did the designs on my homework assignments for each class so there’d be no single database with access to all the schematics.
Very, uh, black ops of you.
Exactly!
But now I don’t have the designs either! Because I turned them in to my teachers!
They’re holding my homework as evidence for my detention.
And now that Principal Dig Dug sentenced me to some kind of bizarre thousand year undead warrior detention…
...I DON’T KNOW IF IT’LL EVER GET BUILT!
(Hm, what’s that Blue Max kid so jittery for?)
AHH!
I didn’t even say anything!
Y-yeah, but I could feel you thinking about it!
(They should call this place Mind Reader High.)
Well, sorry?
I-it’s okay. Did Taira send you?
Taira? Why would he send me?
For the rest of his homework.
I’m almost done!
Don’t tell him it’s not ready yet!
(Poor kid. He’s really shaken up...)
How long are you gonna let him treat you like this?
Do I look like I have a choice?
I’m so little…
I’ll have to do Taira’s homework until I’m a shriveled up shell of a student and then he’ll move on to someone else.
Like you.
I gotta figure something out by tomorrow...
There’s gotta be something we can do.
There is.
Kinda.
But I’d need help.
Let’s hear it.
SECRET PROJECT SUPER PLANE.
The specs are divided into 48 separate homework assignments kept in various teacher lockboxes around Namco High.
What are you suggesting, Max?
A heist!
It’ll require a lot of planning though. We’d have to meet somewhere isolated and secure to discuss the details.
Sounds like the roof.
Th-the roof?!
OF THE SCHOOL?!?
But it’s so… it’s so…
...not on the ground.
Yeah, that’s where they put ‘em these days.
What’s the problem? Aren’t you a bird?
F-fine! Yes. It’s not like I’m scared. Who said I was!
Meet me on the roof at noon hundred hours.
(Never done a heist before! This could be fun! I never would’ve thought a nerdy little guy like Max would be up for one.)
Okay, I’m in!
(Y’know, I’m not doing Max any favors by helping him. He’s got to learn to stand on his own feet and tackle his problems head on!)
(Um, metaphorically anyway.)
I dunno. I’ll have to think about it.
Please, ${slot:playerName}?
You’re the only one I can turn to!
(Never done a heist before! This could be fun! I never would’ve thought a nerdy little guy like Max would be up for one.)
Okay, I’m in!
(Y’know, I’m not doing Max any favors by helping him. He’s got to learn to stand on his own feet and tackle his problems head on!)
(Um, metaphorically anyway.)
I dunno. I don’t think so, Max.
Wait for Detention to End.
Are you sure you don’t want to talk to anyone else?
No, Wait I wanted to talk to someone…
Yeah, I just want out of here.
Seems like all you riff-raff decided to show...
Admirable...
But King insists it doesn’t excuse any of your miscreant behavior yesterday.
We’re giving you another chance accept your punishment.
See you at the bell.
(I wonder if anyone else got in trouble yesterday?)
(I don’t think any of us are EVER getting out of here.)
hey ${slot:playerName}
we haven’t talked since you got in trouble
im sorry for being such a smug jerk about it
even if i knew it was going to happen
No, it’s my fault. I let you get to me and I acted stupidly.
It was entirely my fault that I got double detention…
If I’d just gotten up with the rest of the class, I wouldn’t have gotten in trouble.
huh? you really think that?
but everything happened exactly like i said it would
what part of omniscient game guide arent you getting
Yeah, I … don’t really believe that stuff?
I mean… I was in control of what I was doing.
And besides, if you’d said nothing about me getting in trouble, I wouldn’t have fought so hard to prove you wrong…
So that just proves that I had a choice after all.
If I didn’t, you wouldn’t have felt like you had to influence me, right?
yeah i dunno if i can follow that
i think youre in denial pretty hard
Ha! I could say the same about you though, right?
I mean, you’re fighting so hard to prove that you’re in control and you know everything that’s gonna happen. You must be pretty scared.
but i did know everything that was gonna happen
thats whats tripping me up with your logic here ${slot:playerName}
no matter how you try to explain it
you did still end up in double detention like i said you would
and lets admit it
the circumstances were pretty contrived
so yeah that point goes to davesprite in my opinion
I dunno. It was pretty stupid of me to get in trouble that way.
But… I’d rather own my decisions, even the stupid ones.
I’d rather make a choice that goes really badly than think I have no choice at all.
So yeah, that one was on me.
Hey Davesprite! Did you hear I got in trouble again…
yeah that was pretty much gonna happen no matter what
Ha! Do I really seem like that much of a troublemaker?
oh yeah ${slot:playerName} youre a bad seed
mom told me to stay away from you
Really?! She said that?!
i dont have a mom actually
but thats a whole can of worms i so dont want to get into right now
its some seriously complicated business
i dont even know if i really understand it myself actually
...I don’t really know how to respond to that.
yeah no kidding
anyway my point was
you were gonna get in trouble no matter what
thats what happens in that part of the game
Ugh, more of this nonsense?!
Can’t you just be real with me?!
i am being realer than real with you ${slot:playerName}
in the second part of the game you get in trouble no matter what
and the next part is kinda the aftermath of that? it goes in different directions though
I’m sorry, but I’m starting to get kind of angry…
You’re wrong, Davesprite.
I was in control of all the decisions I made the other day.
I was there. I felt it.
well of course you did
youre in the game
Can you shut up about “the game” for five seconds?! Jeez!
It’s so frustrating.
I made the decisions I made because I wanted to.
Nothing you can say will make me think otherwise!
yeah but your decisions messed you up and got you in double detention
isnt it kinda liberating to know that was gonna happen no matter what
and it wasnt really your fault?
im just trying to help you out here ${slot:playerName}
i mean im a guide arent i
Even if my choices were stupid…
I’d rather have made them myself, than have made no choice at all.
So yeah, this one was on me. Sorry, Davesprite.
haha you blew it
you had to have picked me for at least one of the past two events to be able to get me for this third one
but you didnt so now you cant
wow how can you even deal with a loss like this
I don’t know. But I’ll find a way, somehow.
Even though my life has reached its darkest hour, I will carry on.
I’ll always remember you, Davesprite.
haha okay
zing
but jokes on you ${slot:playerName}
now that you cant do events with me anymore
ill never be able to tell you the secret of the ultimate perfect true ending of all endings
What do you mean “ending”?!
You are just... SO baffling.
How do the teachers even put up with you?
i dunno i dont think theres any actual classtime scenes in this game
anyway yeah the ultimate ending is lost to you forever sorry
spoiler alert: you get to marry every character at once
its pretty hot
but i dont need to tell that to a healthy red-blooded gamer like you
Um… are you crazy?
There’s no way that could happen.
Even if we WERE living in a video game, it’d be such a contrived ending!
fine dont believe me i dont care
just means i wont tell you any of the locations of the ten secret easter eggs that when gathered all together unlock the route to the perfect harem ending
the characters all have special outfits for that one
if you know what i mean
I’m going to go now.
(haha that oughta keep those suckers busy for a while)
Hi honey!
Where’s that scarf I bought you?
Don’t you want to be, like, popular?
My ex Wada-Don never wore anything I bought for him, either...
(If I say anything, I feel like I’m going to snap at Donko…
I don’t want to do that until I’ve figured out how I feel about her.)
Hee hee, why so shy?
...You’re not still mad at me about getting caught, are you?
C’mon, honey, get over it! Nobody ever stays mad at me for long.
… I thought you didn’t want to be judged on your cuteness and popularity.
I thought you liked me to be honest with you.
...Or was that all just part of the show?
...You’re being weird today, honey…
What do I keep telling you! Nobody likes weird kids!
OMG, it’s like you don’t even WANT to be popular…
(Donko’s just playing dumb…
She’s got to know why I’m upset at her.
Sigh… I’ve got to figure out how I feel.)
...You’re like, being super weird, honey…
OMG! You sure got in trouble, honey!
Oh man…
Does EVERYONE at school know?!
Maybe…
But like, don’t worry.
I got in trouble yesterday too!
Ta-don! You have that in common with ME now!
That can only help your social status…
And everyone loves rebels like us.
Tee-hee!
You got in trouble too?!
Yep! I snuck out to go to the mall.
And, no need to thank me, but…
I got you this nice scarf!
A cute accessory is one of the main keys to being, like, SUPER popular.
You got in trouble… just to get something for me?
Oh, it was nothing!
I had to do SOMETHING to thank you for being so nice to me the other day.
Now you can look as good outside as you are inside!
You’re welcome, honey.
Donko… thank you…
So I guess that means we’ll have double detention together, huh?
Oh, no way!
I never have double detention. SO not my style.
Huh?
But how did you get out of it?
By flashing my cutest smile, duh!
It’s how I get out of trouble every time.
No one can resist an adorable face like mine!
Even King falls in drum-line when I show my puppy-dog eyes.
Tee-hee! There’s definite benefits to being cute and popular!
You’ll learn soon enough, honey.
...What?
You just… think you can get away with anything…
Just because you’re cute?
Um…
DUH?!
(Then… what if …
What if Donko’s only being so nice to me…
To try to charm me into doing what she wants?
How can I trust someone…
Who takes advantage of people like that?)
Hm? You got quiet all of a sudden, honey.
Quiet kids are only popular in the movies!
So! We’re like, totally hanging out tomorrow, right?
You’re on your way, but you’re not popular YET!
(I can’t tell if I want to hang out, anymore…
Does Donko have any real feelings for me?
I thought I felt...something from her...)
OMG! You got in SO much trouble, honey!
Are you going for some kind of “class rebel” status?!
Because, like, I’m pretty sure that’s taken by Hiromi…
Oh, man… does everyone already know what happened?
I can’t believe it.
Oh honey, I’m the most popular student at Namco High!
Whatever happens in these walls, I like, hear about it.
Just because I know, doesn’t mean EVERYONE knows!
Oh!
Well! That’s a relief…
Teehee! Yep, it doesn’t mean EVERYONE knows…
But they totally do.
Sorry, honey.
SIGH…
So… Hiromi is really more of a class rebel than me?
What about when I rolled up the whole school?
That doesn’t count for any cool rebel points?
Not really…
Sorry honey, but it definitely seemed sort of… accidental.
Maybe it would help if you dressed more like Hiromi, though…
OMG! I could totally take you shopping!
Er…
I’ll pass on that one, thanks.
Can’t believe I got MORE detention for trying to rehearse…
It’s, like, what do they want from me?
Get detention, show some school spirit to get out of it OR MAYBE GET MORE DETENTION FOR IT!
Double detention, even. Whatever that is.
It’s all Aki’s fault really.
(Wow, never seen Galaga Ship so upset…)
Can’t believe I got MORE detention for trying to rehearse…
It’s, like, what do they want from us?
Get detention, show some school spirit to get out of it OR MAYBE GET MORE DETENTION FOR IT!
It’s all Aki's fault really.
(Wow, never seen Galaga Ship so upset…)
What's up, Hiromi?
Oh... Hey, kid.
(I wonder if these stoic silences are a form of communication.)
(... Like, psychic communication.)
And now it's kind of awkward.)
Ummm.....
You... Look really excited today?
Do I?
(Not at all... I'm just looking for something to say.)
It's because I'm competing in a race today.
(!!! SHE WAS EXCITED AFTER ALL... )
C-Cool! Maybe I'll come watch it.
Sure.
Hey, kid.
Oh, hi Hiromi! Ready for your big race?
I think so.
Dr. Tomari's making some last-minute tune-ups based on the data we collected yesterday.
Oh... That's great!
.... You coming?
Huh? I think so.
(Wow... She seems pleased.
Come to think of it, that's the first time she's ever asked me that kind of thing... )
(I guess we're friendly now.)
Hey Hiromi!
Hey kid.
(It's no use... I'll never beat her at meaningful silences.)
Good luck at the race today, Hiromi!
…………………… thanks.
Hey Jane.
I guess you’re probably gonna report on how I got in trouble in the paper, huh…?
Hoo hoo, yes, I heard about that.
Can’t keep yourself out of shenanigans, eh? :B
Actually, I can respect that.
But no, I’m working on a much larger exposé for the paper.
Oh? What would that be?
Well, what you said about Terezi never taking her horns off…
I had to admit, it was a bit of a head-scratcher.
So I’ve decided to investigate!
And when I prove that she really IS just a cosplay enthusiast…
Maybe you’ll finally understand that all this “supernatural stuff” is just in your head!
Jane… I don’t think its all in my head.
I’m literally from space.
Oh, that’s such a load of nonsense!
Terezi tried to pull that one on me too, actually…
I could hardly give her horns a good tug before she pulled her sword on me.
They must be held on with some kind of super cosplay glue!
Hold on. Back up. “Sword”?!
Oh, not to worry. I had my spoon ready. It’s my favored strife specibus!
I have it queued up in my fetch modus for just such an occasion.
Stop saying fake words.
Use real words.
This isn’t Sillytown, where everyone speaks Silly language.
Huh? Do you not have a fetch modus?
Jane, can’t you admit that strange things are happening at this school?!
Even YOU’RE talking about weird stuff now!
Are you just in denial?!
Oh shush.
Just because you haven’t heard of a technology doesn’t mean it’s “weird”!
...I give up.
Maybe Terezi’s horns wouldn’t come off because…
Because…
Yes?!
...Because they’re sewn onto a full-body costume that she wears zipped up at all times! :B
SIGH.
Hi Jane. Having a nice normal day at school?
As a matter of fact, I am! :B
SIGH.
Oh, honestly…
Are you going to be in a mood about this for the entire rest of the school year?
You could stand to cut me a break, you know.
I just wish there were a way…
To make you see things from my perspective.
But ${slot:playerName}…
That’s what I’m frustrated about too, don’t you see?
You just won’t listen to my point of view!
I… I guess that’s a fair point…
Still… I think that if you asked anyone else at the school, they’d be on my side.
Hmm? What was that?
Nothing!
Hoo hoo! Hello there ${slot:playerName}! :B
Hey Jane! How goes the pranking business?
Oh, very well…
In fact…
Look over… THERE!
(Huh? What’s she pointing at?
Behind me…
GAH! A SPIDER!
...Oh, it’s a fake plastic one.)
HOO HOO HOO! :B
Heh… G-good one…
Hey, Lolo-
I’m just gonna do this like a bandaid.
Look, I… I got busted for cheat codes.
What?! Lolo! Why… Why would you mess with that stuff!
You couldve gotten in serious trouble!
Did you try to give yourself extra lives or something?
No, I just wanted to skip over my classes and get easy grades.
No big deal, right?
Lolo… Do you even care about yourself at all?
I’m so disappointed…
Please, don’t pull that on me.
You’re just like Klonoa…
(Klonoa again…)
School doesn’t matter anyway… The kids who work the hardest are just setting themselves up for disappointment!
I just find that… really sad, okay?!
And yeah, I just wanted to skip over that, is that so bad?
But if they caught you using cheat codes…. why aren’t you expelled?
...I didn’t actually get to do it.
Because you stopped yourself before you could?!
No! Because… because King caught me.
I wish…
I wish you had trusted me to talk to you about it.
${slot:playerName}…
You’re so stupid.
When you say stuff like that, it just makes things harder.
What do you mean, stupid??
It doesn’t matter.
(Just because it doesn’t matter to YOU…)
You know, after we did that ‘Abstract Concept of Detention’...
I actually feel… vaguely chastised?
Maybe it actually worked!
Sorry.
Just trying to lighten the mood a little.
Why do you keep hanging around me…
What was that?
Nothing. Go away.
Go away! Jeez!
So you got in trouble again, huh?
Urgh, yeah…
What, do you expect me to be impressed or something?
Nobody’s gonna remember this in a week.
What?! No! Why would you think…
SIGH.
(For someone who thinks life is meaningless, she’s leaping to some weird conclusions.)
…Hi, Boss.
Meowkie! Are you okay?
Yeah... it’s okay that I got in trouble...
I totally understand.
I’m just sorry that you had to get dragged into it!
You didn’t do anything wrong!
Neither did you!
Meowkie, it was wrong of Principal Dig Dug to take your Hall Monitor badge away.
And, I’ve decided...
I want to help you get it back.
…Boss...
That’s... so nice...
It’s nicer than I deserve…
What do you mean, “nicer than you deserve”?
You can’t really believe all that stuff people say about you, right?
Well, I dunno, Boss…
I try my hardest, but…
There’s this saying: “If lotsa people tell you it’s raining, you should get an umbrella.”
Seems everybody at school thinks it’s raining... ya know?
Well, I don’t!
I know you by now, Meowkie…
You don’t do anything wrong!
How can you sit there and just take that lying down?!
Heh… You’re right as always, Boss.
Somebody as spineless as me woulda made a pretty pathetic Hall Monitor anyway…
Oh no… I’ve just made it worse.
I better shut up before I say something stupid again…
...Yeah… maybe it’s for the best I ain’t a hall monitor anymore…
I got time now to do other stuff.
Like…
Work on my… yarn ball… collection.
...Oh! You have a yarn ball collection?
Um… not yet…
But now I got plenty of time to start one! Heh…
Hi Meowkie!
Sorry we haven’t hung out much lately…
Oh… Hiya, Boss…
That’s… okay…
(Wow, that’s a lot less enthusiasm than I’m used to seeing from Meowkie…)
...Well, see ya around…
Meowkie! Wait!
I… I hope you’re not angry with me.
...H-huh?
Oh, no! No way, Boss!
I’d never get angry at you for nothin’!
W-why, who told you I was?!
Um, no one.
I just thought-
Cuz I never get angry at nobody, never!
I swear, Boss!
I… I don’t really even get angry in the first place.
Okay?
Huh? Really?
You don’t get angry at anything? No matter what?
Nya ha… No way…
I mean, it don’t accomplish much, right?
I don’t see the point in getting mad...
So, I just never do it!
(Wow, if she’s this much in denial…
She must be more messed up than I thought.
Poor Meowkie.)
...Why’d you think I would be mad atcha, anyway?
N-not that I ever would, of course!
Oh, just because…
I’m sure you’ve heard about how I got in trouble.
I thought as a Hall Monitor, you’d be…
disappointed in me.
...Heh…
You don’t gotta worry about that no more, Boss.
See, I got in trouble too…
Whaaat? How??
And… they said it was one time too many…
Which I totally understand, of course.
And they kinda… took away my Hall Monitor badge.
Heh… isn’t it funny how life works sometimes?
Somethin’ you were so… sure of…
Bein’ gone so quick like that.
Ha ha…
What?!
I can’t believe they would do that to you!
It’s so unfair!
N-no, they… had their reasons…
It ain’t a big deal, boss. Please don’t worry on my account.
It is a big deal.
Being a Hall Monitor was everything to you!
They can’t take that away! I’ll … I’ll fight it!
Meowkie… If you don’t mind me asking…
What even happened?
To be honest, I can’t imagine you breaking even the smallest school rule…
Much less something so big as to get your hall monitor badge taken away.
It was nothin’ big, honest…
I was just trying to stop some kids from fighting in the hallway.
They started arguin’ with me, and making a big scene…
When Principal Digdug saw the commotion, they said I was hassling them, causing trouble…
Who can blame them, really? They just didn’t want detention…
I understand.
Meowkie, are you saying…
They blamed you for the trouble, and you got stuck with the consequences?
… I wouldn’t put it as harsh as that…
But that is what happened, isn’t it?
Is that why you were even in detention with me in the first place?
Because other kids at school use you as a scapegoat?
But why? Why don’t you say anything?!
Why do they treat you that way?
You’re the kindest person I know…
...Boss, you know… where I come from.
Who my family is…
I can understand their being’ suspicious of me.
They’re probably just… more scared of me than I am of them…
Ya know, like with bears…
WHAT?!
Do people really treat you differently here because of that?!
That’s terrible! There’s nothing wrong with you or your family.
You’ve never done anything wrong- can’t they see that?!
Meowkie, why don’t you SAY anything about it?!
Boss… I mean, ${slot:playerName}.
Let’s not talk about this anymore, please….
It’s so… unpleasant.
(Meowkie…
She’s fighting really hard to hide it, but…
I can tell deep down, she’s really furious right now.
At the school, for judging her unfairly?
Or… at me, for bringing it up?
Either way… I better not push it anymore.)
I’m sorry, Meowkie…
Nya! It’s fine, Boss. Nothin’ to be sorry about!
Hiya, Boss!
Jeez, you seem to be gettin’ in trouble a lot lately!
H-heh… yeah…
… Oh jeez! I’m sorry for bein’ so blunt about it!
Nyaaa! Ain’t a cat like me supposed to have tact?!
It’s totally okay, Meowkie!
You weren’t being rude at all.
Phew! That’s a relief.
...Anyway, Boss…
I know we’re pals, but… as Hall Monitor I can’t keep lettin you off the hook, ya know?!
If I ever see you in trouble again, no more free passes! Capische?!
...Uh, sorry… I mean, if that’s okay with ya.
Haha! Don’t worry, Meowkie.
I know not to cross the likes of you!
Ya know, Boss, as Hall Monitor I know the rules of this school backwards and forwards!
I can recite 'em to you sometimes! I know 'em by heart!
Uh, that sounds really fun, but…
Nyah! I know, right?!
But I have to go… you know, homework, with the… with the thing.
Let’s take a rain check, okay?
Gotcha, boss!
(Phew!)
Uh, hey buddy…
Are you okay?
Not really.
I pretty much feel like dirt.
Which up until recently would be a pretty awesome thing to feel like…
But now it only reminds me of what I’ve lost.
It’s funny how personal tragedy can make even the best things in life seem bad, huh?
The best things in life…
Like…
Dirt?
Yeah.
${slot:playerName}… you really get me.
I don’t deserve a friend like you…
Come on, I haven’t really done anything…
I wish I could though. I really do.
Hey, maybe I could try to cheer you up!
You always say digging is about discovery, right?
Maybe you can “discover” a way to be happy… without digging!
(Yikes, that was really weak.)
I’ve discovered something alright…
If you dig far enough down…
There’s just a dark hole that keeps going and going and never ends.
Like uncovering an extensive cave system full of deadly gas.
Man, those are cool. Or at least, they USED to be...
(Mr. Driller was always kinda unstable.
But at least before, it was balanced with his passion and happy energy…
His determination to make his dreams come true.
Now, ONLY the creepy parts are left!
I’ve watched this from the sidelines long enough. It’s time to do something…
I want the old Mr. Driller back.)
Your dad gave up digging too…
Maybe he has some advice on how to deal with it!
He says the pain never really gets easier... it just gets more familiar.
(Ok. That’s pretty much the most depressing thing I’ve ever heard.
Why do the angsty ones always have to be so cute?!)
(Uh oh, there’s Mr. Driller.
I’m really dreading having to tell him I probably won’t be able to do Digging Club again, thanks to my double detention.
I hope he can forgive me…)
${slot:playerName}…. I hope you can forgive me.
Thanks to me, the Digging Club…
Won’t be meeting anymore.
Wow! That’s amaz-
I mean, uh, TERRIBLE!
What happened?!
I’m sure you’ve noticed…
The statue of my father, Principal DigDug, has been destroyed.
I thought something seemed off today!
It was the fault of… my beloved drills.
I used them recklessly, in anger…
And destroyed the statue of my father.
And even though I didn’t really know what I was doing…
I… think it may not have been entirely an accident.
I think some part of me wanted to destroy it…
...This may come as a huge shock, but…
I’ve realized that, deep down, I’ve got a little bit of resentment towards my dad.
Wow, uh…
That is a shock.
I’ve always said digging is about discovery…
But I never thought I’d unearth something so terrible…. emotions-wise.
It really is better if I never dig again.
Just like my dad.
Mr. Driller, I’m so sorry that happened.
What are you going to do now?
Sigh. I don’t know, ${slot:playerName}.
What do people do, when they can no longer dig?
...Literally every other activity in the entire world.
That was a rhetorical question.
(Wow, he’s really in a bad way…
I miss the old Mr. Driller, who had passion and joy along with his weird stuff.
I wish there was something I could do…)
Hi ${slot:playerName}!
Boy, you really dug yourself into a mess this time!
How long have you been waiting to use that one?
Oh, I pretty much say it every day.
Seriously though, I’m sorry you’re in trouble again.
I’ve got some good news, though!
Since you need some cheering up.
Oh yeah? Is it a way to get out of double detention or something?
No! It’s the news that… I finally found a new member for my Digging Club!
We’re now officially approved by the school, and my dad can’t stop me from digging in it!
Uh… wow!
That… that IS great news!
Who joined the club?
Well, my mom has a friend who goes to Namco High…
And she asked her to join the Digging Club! You know, as a personal favor to her!
Hiromi’s pretty busy with her own stuff, so she won’t be around to actually dig too often-
But all we really needed was another student’s name on the roster, so!
(Hiromi is friends with Mr. Driller’s mom?!)
I guess, even though my mom hated my dad’s obsessive drilling…
It was the fact that he ignored her that she didn’t like, not the drilling itself.
She doesn’t want me to have to give up my dreams, just because they’re having problems!
Even Dad agreed with her… eventually… and extremely reluctantly.
(Isn’t all this information a little… personal?
Oh well.)
That’s great, Mr. Driller!
I’m really glad things worked out for you.
I hope things will work out for me, too!
Well, if you need anything dug up, you know who to call!
...Me, Mr. Driller.
I like digging more than breathing.
I know buddy.
Say ${slot:playerName}… Hiromi’s really somethin’, right? A real “tall drink of water”...
Whatever that means.
I think it just means that she is tall.
Hee hee… I wonder if she’s single?
Um… Good luck with that.
Nidia? What's wrong?
It's nothing...
... Are you sure?
I tried approaching some more people... About combining...
It didn't go so well.
In fact, to call it a disaster would be an understatement.
The only thing I can combine with... is Rejection.
I'm sorry Nidia... Have you tried approaching Blue Max?
Oh I couldn't do that to him... I think there are aspects of being a dragon he wouldn't care for.
Oh... Maybe Tomari?
Tomari?! I couldn't... I wouldn't want to let him down...
He already does so much for me.
Oh...
Um... will you be at the library later?
*Sigh* Where else?
(Man... She's really down... Maybe I should talk to her... )
Nidia? About yesterday...
I'm sorry if I did anything wrong... I just wanted to help.
${slot:playerName}... I should be apologizing to you. I'm sorry for making a scene.
N-no, it's okay. Sometimes you have to let it all out.
Sniff...
Usually I'm okay, but sometimes...
I just want to collapse under the weight of it all.
Anyway... If you don't hate me already, I'll be at magic club again. I hope I see you there.
(I should probably go see her... I think she could really use a friend right now.)
Nidia? What's wrong?
It's nothing...
... Are you sure?
${slot:playerName}... We all face our destiny alone.
(Wh-whoa... Heavy stuff... )
Are you sure you don't need to, like... Talk about it?
You're right... Maybe I can talk to Tomari... He always listens to me...
(Oof... I hope she's okay!)
Sigh………………… maybe I’m just destined to be a lone wolf….
More like a lone dragon!
(Gosh, she could probably use a friend….. )
Hey, Richard.
Surprised you’re still in detention.
muncha munch
Still into those cupcakes, huh?
muncha
GULP
Yeah.
Got caught off school grounds.
But I had a good reason!
Not that conspiracy stuff again.
No, of course not.
I was surveying all the local bakeries and cafes for more CUPCAKE INTEL.
(I’ve created a monster…)
And King caught me during his daily muffin run!
More detention for me, but on the bright side I figured out where he went every day! You better believe that’s in the dossier now.
Richard, you’ve got to slow down.
Um, and calm down.
It’s like you’re going through life permanently stuck in turbo boost.
It’s just…
Life’s so short.
Yeah, but you’ve got to slow down to live it.
I...never thought of it like that before.
You’re right, ${slot:playerName}! I’ll make it up to you. I swear!
I...never thought of it like that before.
You’re right, ${slot:playerName}! I’ll make it up to you. I swear!
IN THE FASTEST WAY POSSIBLE!
(Ugh, I am not getting through to this guy at all…)
(Gotta talk to Richard about what happened!)
(Hmm, except, where’s he gotten off to?)
(Oh.)
(There.)
Man, I see you back there!
Don’t you “!!!” me, buddy!
What happened at the cafe?! You let me get caught!
And you let me get away.
Well. Yes.
I did.
I just didn’t see why we should both get in trouble.
Why did you let me get caught!
It was my amazing reflexes, ${slot:playerName}!
I’d acted without realizing it. That’s the curse of this supernatural sense of timing I have been blessed with.
No. Cursed with!
Richard, you’ve got to slow down.
Um, and also calm down. A LOT.
It’s like you’re going through life permanently stuck in turbo boost!
It’s just…
Life’s so short.
Yeah, but you’ve got to slow down to live it.
I...never thought of it like that before.
You’re right, ${slot:playerName}! I’ll make it up to you. I swear!
(I’m going to regret this, but…)
(...maybe I finally got through to him. Guess there’s only one way to find out.)
I just don’t know, Richard…
I’ve never been more sure of anything IN MY LIFE!
(What’s he talking about?)
Alfonso “Al” B. Tross, working in conjunction with Tomari, under orders from Blue Max, are all conspiring to upgrade Galaga Ship’s weapon systems to RULE NAMCO CITY FROM ORBIT.
(Um.)
Uh.
Richard?
You believe me, don’t you ${slot:playerName}?
It couldn’t be more obvious! All the evidence is RIGHT IN FRONT OF OUR EYES!
You just have to stretch and bend the facts a little.
And then a lot.
And then invent some stuff to fill in the holes.
Yeah. Okaaaay then.
I need to consider all this evidence.
Uh…
Hey, Taira.
C’mon, don’t be mad…
I’m not mad, ${slot:playerName}…
I just…
I blew it…
Before I even got a chance to show you what a rad dude I am…
And now you hate me forever!
I never realized it before… but life is like, mad cruel, yo!
Taira, don’t you think you’re being a little dramatic?
See! Just another thing I do wrong!
I’m such an idiot… I wish I could get revenge on MYSELF!
W-wait! No!
(Please tell me he’s not gonna start crying again…)
Sniff…
Sniff…
Don’t look at me like that, yo!
(...There’s no use talking to him when he’s like this.)
Yo Cuz! Long time, no see!
Heard you got in trouble again!
I don’t know.
Trouble seems to follow me here, I guess.
You better count your lucky stars I like you so much, Cuz.
Breaking the rules is like, way uncool.
I might have to get revenge on you for that one!
Revenge… on me?
Wh-what did I do?!
(Is this another of his weird flirting things?)
Nothin’! I just get revenge on folks all the time.
For all kindsa stuff! Being late for school… Making fun of my hair… Just looking at me wrong...
I probably won’t revenge YOU though, seeing as you’re so cute!
But that Blue Max kid… I got MAD revenge on him!
Haw haw! It was so rad! You shoulda been there, Cuz.
Blue Max?!
But… he’s so sweet… Kinda loopy, but definitely sweet.
Why would you think he deserves revenge?
Haw! That little nerd scored better than me on the history test yesterday!
Total disrespect to me and my clan, yo!
So I tried to get some revenge on him yesterday.
He got away this time, but next time he won’t be so lucky!
He thinks he’s so smart, but you can’t out-think a punch in the FACE!
Or beak, I guess. Wait, the beak’s not the whole face…
I dunno. I ain’t exactly big on biology.
Anyway, punching RULES! My clan got MAD AVENGED, yo!
Taira…
What are you saying?
Huh?
Yo, aren’t you proud of me?
You tried to hurt a poor defenseless kid…
Just because he scored higher on a test than you?
You wanted to punch him in the beak?!
For “revenge”?!
I can’t believe it…
I thought you had a heart of gold deep down…
But the only person who would do something like that…
Is just a big bully!
Wh-what?!
${slot:playerName}…
Yo, why are you saying all these mean things to me…
I’m not a bully… I just do revenge…
For my clan, and stuff...
${slot:playerName}… Please don’t be mad at me!
I don’t get it!
(What’s all this “clan” stuff about, anyway?
Never mind… I can’t ask him about it when I’m so angry…)
${slot:playerName}…
Cmon, talk to me!
Please don’t be mad…
Taira…
Crying’s not gonna get me to feel sorry for you.
Leave me alone.
I don’t want to talk to you right now.
${slot:playerName}…
(I don’t want to talk to Taira right now.)
Yo! Cuz!
What’s up, nerd!
You been avoiding me or something?!
Haha…
Why would I ever…
do a thing like that…
I heard about what happened!
You gone crazy or something? HAW HAW!
Maybe you’re not such a wimp after all!
Wow… really?
Taira, I-
Nah, just kidding. You’re totally a wimp.
HAW HAW!
Charming.
What’s it like being such a huge wimp anyway?
...It’s really awesome, Taira.
WHAT?! SERIOUSLY?!
Yo, this changes everything...
H3Y COTTON C4NDY!

I guess on the night of that incident… I was rolling the school up with my katamari.

4N 4DM1SS1ON OF GU1LT!

Iguana, or something?

1T’S 4 SC4L3M4T3 YOU DUMMY!

TH1S W4S TH3 B3ST SC4L3M4T3 OF 4LL…
MY B3LOV3D OLD P4RTN3R, PYR4LSP1T3!
PYR4LSP1T3’S B33N BY MY S1D3 FOR M4NY SW33PS
BUT NOW H3’S GON3!
What?! That “old partner” you were talking about…
Has just been a stuffed animal all this time?
HOW D4R3 YOU T4LK 4BOUT PYR4LSP1T3 L1K3 TH4T!
H3’S B33N M1SS1NG S1NC3 TH3 N1GHT OF YOUR R41NBOW DONUT 1NC1D3NT…
WH4T H4V3 YOU GOT TO S4Y FOR YOURS3LF?!
Um...Nothing?
What’s going on?
TH4T’S GOOD 3NOUGH FOR M3!
TH3 V3RD1CT 1S 1N, COTTON C4NDY
GU1LTY!!!
(I’m so confused…
AUGH! SHE’S JUMPING ON ME!
HELP! HER PUNCHES ARE SURPRISINGLY STRONG!)
alright alright break it up
Sorry about this, ${slot:playerName}.
She does that a lot, I’m afraid!
(Oh, thank goodness they pulled us apart…
That was so humiliating! And painful!)
How… how can you have the audacity to sit there grinning at me like that?!
After what you just tried to do to me?!
For NO REASON?!
1T W4S FUN W4SN’T 1T?
L3T’S DO 1T 4G41N SOM3T1M3 <3
H1 COTTON C4NDY <3
D1D YOU M1SS M3?
What?! No!!
I’m not even sure I want to talk to you again after how you treated me!
4W COM3 ON! >:P

Why are you even so obsessed with me?!

H3H3H3H3!
L3T’S H4NG OUT 4G41N SOON, OK4Y? <3

Just to figure out what exactly her damage is.

H3H3H3
SO 1 H34RD YOU GOT 1N TROUBL3 R3C3NTLY

TH3Y 4LW4YS TH1NK TH3Y C4N G3T 4W4Y W1TH 1T…
BUT JUST 4T TH3 V3RY L4ST T4NT4L1Z1NG MOM3NT
TH3 L4W 4LW4YS C4TCH3S UP W1TH TH3M >:]
(I’m gonna give Terezi a wide berth from now on.
A really, REALLY wide berth.)
(There’s Tomari. He seems...different?)
(Of course he’s keeping to himself and reading. That’s normal for him.)
(But something’s not right.)
(Oh! He’s reading a magazine.)
(A celebrity gossip magazine for teens!)
(That’s not like Tomari at all. What gives?)
Hey, Tomari. You okay?
Okay?
OKAY?
No. I am not “okay.”

I was trying to fix a critical error in the design of my Super Robot. But, I don’t know, maybe I shouldn’t conduct incredibly dangerous experiments without my glasses? Anyway, there was another explosion and…
and
...and my life’s work, the Super Robot, is no more.
Nothing matters.
(Starting to sound like Anti-Bravoman…)
Without my super robot, we’ll never win the big Robot Battle Brawl against Dr. Kubota’s engineering club from Evil Namco High, the morale AND morals of our study body will be OBLITERATED.
All of Namco Land will crumble and fall. We shall be swallowed up in ten thousand years of darkness.
Um. Oh.
Yes, “oh.”
“Oh” indeed.
I couldn’t have put it better myself, ${slot:playerName}!
And since there’s no time to make a NEW super robot, we are destined to lose the Robot Battle Brawl match, everything we know and love will be swallowed by flame and weird stuff.
DARK STUFF.
Because evil.
All because I wasn’t vigilant enough to stop it!
So, I’ve given up on inventing. And life in the more general sense too.
Therefore: TEEN MAGS!
Okay then. I’ll, uh, I’ll catch you later, okay, Tomari?
Sure. Good luck to you in the bleak future, ${slot:playerName}. You’re small, use that to hide in the shadows when bandit raiders come looking for food.
Yeah, I’ll sure do that.
(Sheesh, I liked that guy better when he was just weird instead of depressing and weird.)
Oh, ${slot:playerName}. It’s awful.
Well, those magazines are designed to prey on the reader as much as the celebrities they depict.
Not the magazine, ${slot:playerName}.
Though, yes, also the magazine.
But more immediately, my life’s work was destroyed and stolen by Dr. Kubota! Or his agents. It doesn’t matter.
Nothing matters.
(Gasp!)
Without my super robot, we’ll never win the big Robot Battle Brawl against Dr. Kubota’s engineering club from Evil Namco High, and the morale AND morals of our study body will be OBLITERATED.
And then, well, you know the rest of it.
All of Namco Land will be swallowed up in ten thousand years of darkness.
Yes. All because I wasn’t vigilant enough to stop it!
I squandered all the help you gave me and Namco Land will perish.
So, I’ve given up on inventing.
ON EVERYTHING.
(That explains the teen mags!)
(This is awful. I mean, the reign of evil or whatever isn’t going to happen, that’s just crazy. But it’s upset Tomari so much! Maybe I should do something…?)
Oh, ${slot:playerName}. It’s awful.
Well, those magazines are designed to prey on the reader as much as the celebrities they depict.
Not the magazine, ${slot:playerName}.
Though, yes, also the magazine.
But more immediately, my life’s work was destroyed and stolen by Dr. Kubota! Or his agents. It doesn’t matter.
Nothing matters.
It doesn’t even matter that we were unfairly blamed for it.
That matters a little bit. It’s why we’re in detention!
That’s just it, ${slot:playerName}. There’s no difference between freedom or detention anymore. We’re doomed to lose the Robot Battle Brawl against Evil Namco High.
Everything we know and love will DIE.
And it’s all because of me.
Tomari!
No, ${slot:playerName}. You’ve been a dear friend.
Maybe...maybe in a world where hope still existed I could’ve been...something more to you.
But you’ve done enough already.
Give up on me.
Save yourself.
From the inevitable bandit raiders, I mean.
(Tomari is completely torn up about this stuff!)
(I mean, there’s no way the ten thousand years of darkness thing is real.)
(But anyway, no one at school cares about the Battling Robot Brawl, so it’s not like losing a match no one knows about could bring about the end of civilization as we know it.)
(Still! Tomari needs my help.)
(And I think he might wanna date me if there’s no apocalypse…?)
(Hrm. Poor Tomari. He must be pretty devastated to be reading celebrity teen gossip mags.)
Hey!
(Ah! She's holding my hand... She did it so easily.)
I've been thinking of a new nickname for you... Tell me what you think...
....Cutiemari!
It's like KATAMARI... But cutiemari.
The cutiemari is you.
Are you stunned by how great it is? Well, while you're reeling...
... I think we should hang out tomorrow evening. If you wait til it's dark and go out to Zweihander Ridge, you can watch the fireflies.
Just the two of us. No swordfighting or pwnage, promise.
It'll be fun. And I'll be honest with you.
Hey cutie! I'm going to watch fireflies tomorrow night. Need to take a break from all that hard work.
Haven't you been skipping all your detention and club work?
Shhhh.
(She's fun... And maybe I can find out why she's in detention...
I'm really curious.)
Hey cutie! See you tomorrow night?
Hey noob.
What've you been up, Valkyrie?
Wouldn't you like to know...
(She blew me a kiss... )
Hey cutie! I’m busy right now… come back later.
